description: Sedge (Carex pensylvanica 'Straw Hat') is an amazing plant species for any green space. This sedge is straightforward to maintain, needing very little water or sunlight. It's also an evergreen, meaning it will stay colourful and lush all year round. The fluffy, bright golden flowers make a stunning display when in bloom throughout early summer, providing a wonderful visual contrast to whatever else is nearby. Plus, it has a great texture and lacks any significant insect or disease problems. All in all, it's an excellent addition to your garden, providing both colour and substance throughout the year.
